parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword for the hostname. The search is not case-sensitive. Use the SearchMode parameter to switch between a fuzzy search and an exact search. The default is an exact search.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from 1. The default value is 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. The maximum value is 100. The default value is 20.

parameters.name: SearchMode
parameters.description:
The search mode. Valid values:

- **LIKE**: fuzzy search

- **EXACT**: exact search (default)

This parameter is used with the Keyword parameter.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The tag. Valid values:

- ecs: Queries the hostnames that are synchronized from ECS instances to the zone.

- If you do not specify this parameter, all DNS records in the zone are queried.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The client IP address of the user.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the zone.
